Articles.Content: Is there a setting or mod that will prevent the velocity reference from changing if I am targeting an object on the ground?  I have missed my target because the velocity switched from surface to target.

I know of no such mod, but stuff like Kerbal Engineer Redux or MechJeb do provide you speed readouts in their info windows that don't change reference (not sure if they're stuck to orbital or to surface - probably the former, but I can't say for sure). MechJeb can additionally show you your landing point on the surface based on your current trajectory. This might help you land near a target more reliably.
You can also click on the your velocitybox, so you can change between surface, orbital and target.
